class.name: position_controllers/CartesianController
class.description: The CartesianController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a position interface.

class.name: velocity_controllers/CartesianController
class.description: The CartesianController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to a velocity interface.

class.name: effort_controllers/CartesianController
class.description: The CartesianController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines and sends commands to an effort interface.
